title: Children's Church
meta_content: Faith Alive Fellowship offers childcare during normal services for ages 4 through 10.
content: Come on in and join the all-original comic book curriculum featuring the Warriors of the Word! Childcare is provided for all regular services for ages 4 through 10. All first-time children receive a complementary copy of the comic. Additionally Sunday morning Chilcren's church includes a memory verse, statement of faith, bible story, snacks (when permitted) and an activity, game, craft or experiment that compliments the lesson.
